				add = var:magic_learning_loss_modifier_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

magic_vengeance_modifier = {
	icon = magic_positive
	hostile_scheme_phase_duration_add = minor_scheme_phase_duration_bonus_value
	enemy_hostile_scheme_phase_duration_add = medium_scheme_phase_duration_malus_value
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:magic_vengeance_modifier_scale
				}
				add = var:magic_vengeance_modifier_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}
haunting_power_modifier = {
	icon = magic_positive
	enemy_hostile_scheme_success_chance_add = 2
	owned_personal_scheme_success_chance_add = 2
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:haunting_power_modifier_scale
				}
				add = var:haunting_power_modifier_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

magic_trait_synergy_paranoid = {
	icon = magic_positive
	general_opinion = -5
	intrigue = 2
	diplomacy = -1
	dread_gain_mult = 0.15
	stress_gain_mult = 0.33
	scheme_discovery_chance_mult = 0.15
	enemy_personal_scheme_success_chance_add = -10
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:magic_trait_synergy_paranoid_scale
				}
				add = var:magic_trait_synergy_paranoid_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

				add = var:magic_monthly_income_modifier_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:county_lower_control_modifier_scale
				}
				add = var:county_lower_control_modifier_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

	icon = magic_negative

			}

				add = 1

					exists = var:magic_arcane_degeneration_modifier_scale
				}
				add = var:magic_arcane_degeneration_modifier_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

magic_martial_animal_gain_modifier_artifact = {
	icon = martial_positive
	martial = 1
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:magic_martial_animal_gain_modifier_artifact_scale
				}
				add = var:magic_martial_animal_gain_modifier_artifact_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

religious_fanaticism_artifact = {
	icon = piety_negative
	different_faith_opinion = -10
	learning = -1
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:religious_fanaticism_artifact_scale
				}
				add = var:religious_fanaticism_artifact_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

magic_trait_synergy_gregarious_artifact = {
	icon = magic_positive
	owned_personal_scheme_success_chance_add = medium_scheme_phase_duration_bonus_value
	attraction_opinion = 5
	general_opinion = 5
	diplomacy = 1
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:magic_trait_synergy_gregarious_artifact_scale
				}
				add = var:magic_trait_synergy_gregarious_artifact_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

movement_speed_positive_modifier_artifact = {
	icon = martial_positive
	movement_speed = 0.1
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:movement_speed_positive_modifier_artifact_scale
				}
				add = var:movement_speed_positive_modifier_artifact_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

magic_archer_cavalry_improvement_add_modifier = {
	icon = magic_positive
	archer_cavalry_damage_mult = 0.05
	archer_cavalry_pursuit_mult = 0.05
	archer_cavalry_screen_mult = 0.05
	archer_cavalry_toughness_mult = 0.05
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:magic_archer_cavalry_improvement_add_modifier_scale
				}
				add = var:magic_archer_cavalry_improvement_add_modifier_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}

	magical_death_toughness_mult = 0.05
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:magic_magical_death_improvement_add_modifier_scale
				}
				add = var:magic_magical_death_improvement_add_modifier_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}
magic_magical_dark_improvement_add_modifier = {
	icon = magic_positive
	magical_dark_damage_mult = 0.05
	magical_dark_pursuit_mult = 0.05
	magical_dark_screen_mult = 0.05
	magical_dark_toughness_mult = 0.05
	
	scale = {
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:level
				}
				add = scope:level
			}
			else = {
				add = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = var:magic_magical_dark_improvement_add_modifier_scale
				}
				add = var:magic_magical_dark_improvement_add_modifier_scale
			}
		}
		desc = MODIFIER_DEFINITION_VALUE_BASED_ON_RITUAL_LEVEL
	}
}
